name: Dashboard UI
description: A responsive dashboard UI built for data visualization.
detailedDescription: This project involved creating an intuitive and interactive dashboard interface. Key features include real-time data updates, customizable widgets, and a user-friendly layout. I focused on optimizing performance and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
myRole: Lead Frontend Developer - Responsible for UI/UX implementation, component development, and integration with backend APIs.

name: E-commerce App
description: A full-featured e-commerce application with product listings and checkout.
detailedDescription: Developed a complete e-commerce platform from scratch. This included user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. Implemented Redux for state management and ensured a smooth user experience across various devices.
myRole: Full Stack Developer - Handled both frontend and backend development, database design, and API creation.

name: Recipe App
description: An application for discovering and managing recipes.
detailedDescription: Built a recipe application that allows users to search, save, and share recipes. Integrated with a third-party recipe API and utilized Firebase for backend services like authentication and data storage. Focused on a clean and intuitive design.
myRole: Frontend Developer - Implemented all frontend components, handled API integrations, and managed state.
